SELECT ptt.team_id FROM pa_task pt INNER JOIN pa_task_team ptt ON pt.id=ptt.task_id
WHERE
pt.paper_id =#{args[0]}
AND pt.is_deleted=0
GROUP BY ptt.team_id

SELECT pt.*, ptt.pj_exam_id, IF(COUNT(ppc.subject_code)=1,ppc.subject_code,'0') AS subject_code, ptt.team_id, pp.xep_file_id, pp.score, pp.title AS paperTitle, ( CASE WHEN pp.difficulity IS NULL THEN '未知难度' WHEN pp.difficulity >= 0 AND pp.difficulity <= 0.2 THEN '困难' WHEN pp.difficulity >= 0.3 AND pp.difficulity <= 0.5 THEN '中等' WHEN pp.difficulity >= 0.6 AND pp.difficulity <= 1.0 THEN '简单' ELSE '未知难度' END ) AS difficultyString
FROM pa_task pt
INNER JOIN pa_paper pp ON pt.paper_id=pp.id
INNER JOIN pa_task_team ptt ON pt.id=ptt.task_id AND ptt.team_id=#{args[1]} and ptt.is_deleted=0
INNER JOIN pa_paper_catalog ppc ON pt.paper_id=ppc.paper_id
AND ppc.subject_code=#{args[0].subjectCode}
AND ppc.stage_code=#{args[0].stageCode}
WHERE
1=1
AND pt.title like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{args[0].title,javaType=java.lang.String}),'%')
AND pt.is_deleted=0
GROUP BY ptt.id
ORDER BY pt.start_time DESC

SELECT pt.*,ptu.team_id,pp.xep_file_id,ptu.finished_flag, pp.score, pp.title AS paperTitle, ( CASE WHEN pp.difficulity IS NULL THEN '未知难度' WHEN pp.difficulity >= 0 AND pp.difficulity <= 0.2 THEN '困难' WHEN pp.difficulity >= 0.3 AND pp.difficulity <= 0.5 THEN '中等' WHEN pp.difficulity >= 0.6 AND pp.difficulity <= 1.0 THEN '简单' ELSE '未知难度' END ) AS difficultyString, ptu.finished_date, IF(COUNT(ppc.subject_code)=1,ppc.subject_code,'0') AS subject_code
FROM pa_task_user ptu
INNER JOIN pa_task pt ON ptu.task_id=pt.id AND pt.is_deleted=0
INNER JOIN pa_paper pp ON pt.paper_id=pp.id
INNER JOIN pa_paper_catalog ppc ON pp.id=ppc.paper_id
AND ppc.subject_code=#{args[0].subjectCode}
AND ppc.stage_code=#{args[0].stageCode}
WHERE
ptu.user_id=#{args[1]} AND ptu.is_deleted=0 GROUP BY pt.id ORDER BY pt.start_time DESC
